import React , {useEffect} from 'react' import '../Home/Home.css' import {FontAwesomeIcon} from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faUsers,faComments,faEnvelope,faSuitcaseRolling,faPlaneUp,faUserTie ,faTrash } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import Reviews from '../../Components/Reviews/Reviews' import axios from 'axios' function Home() { const navigate=useNavigate() const [panelData,setPanelData]=useState({}) useEffect(()=>{ const token = localStorage.getItem('JwtToken') if(!token){ navigate('/admin/login') } axios.get('http://localhost:8000/api/panel').then((response)=>{ setPanelData(response.data) console.log(response.data) }).catch((error)=>{ console.log(error) }) }) return ( <>
